statements: SELECT player_name, games_played, total_points FROM player_rankings;
SELECT player_name, ranking_position FROM player_rankings ORDER BY games_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_rankings WHERE total_points > 1000;
SELECT player_name, ranking_position FROM player_rankings WHERE ranking_position <= 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_rankings ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM player_rankings WHERE games_played > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_points FROM player_rankings WHERE games_played <= 50 ORDER BY total_points ASC;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_points FROM player_rankings WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, games_played, total_points FROM player_rankings WHERE ranking_position BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT player_name, ranking_position, total_points FROM player_rankings WHERE player_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY ranking_position ASC;
SELECT player_name, wins, losses FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE wins > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT player_name, wins, losses FROM players WHERE wins < 5 AND losses > 0 ORDER BY player_name ASC, wins DESC;
SELECT player_name, ranking_position, ranking_date FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id WHERE ranking_position <= 100 ORDER BY ranking_position ASC;
SELECT player_name, wins, losses FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT player_name, wins FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, wins, losses FROM players WHERE wins > 10 ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT player_name, ranking_position, ranking_date FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id ORDER BY ranking_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, wins FROM players WHERE player_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY wins ASC;
SELECT player_name, wins, losses, ranking_date FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id WHERE ranking_position <= 3 ORDER BY ranking_position ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_performance;
SELECT player_id, matches_played, points_scored FROM player_performance WHERE matches_won > 10;
SELECT player_id, rank_position FROM rankings ORDER BY rank_position DESC;
SELECT match_id, winner_id, loser_id, match_date FROM match_results WHERE match_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, SUM(matches_won) AS total_wins FROM player_performance GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_wins > 5;
SELECT player_id, matches_played, matches_won, points_scored FROM player_performance;
SELECT match_id, player1_id, player2_id, winner_id, loser_id, match_date FROM match_results ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, rank_position FROM rankings WHERE rank_position <= 10;

SELECT player_performance.player_id, matches_played, wins.matches_won, points_scored FROM player_performance LEFT JOIN (SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS matches_won FROM match_results WHERE winner_id = player_id GROUP BY player_id) AS wins ON player_performance.player_id = wins.player_id;
SELECT player_id, rank_position, last_updated_date FROM rankings WHERE last_updated_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rank_position ASC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT game_name, game_date, winning_player_id, losing_player_id FROM game WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name, performance.performance_rating FROM player JOIN performance ON player.player_id = performance.player_id JOIN game ON performance.game_id = game.game_id ORDER BY performance.performance_rating DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT game_name, game_date FROM game WHERE game_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY game_date;

SELECT p.player_name, g.game_name, pe.performance_rating FROM player p INNER JOIN performance pe ON p.player_id = pe.player_id INNER JOIN game g ON pe.game_id = g.game_id WHERE pe.performance_rating >= 8 ORDER BY pe.performance_rating DESC;
SELECT r.rank_position, r.rank_date, p.player_name FROM ranking r INNER JOIN player p ON r.player_id = p.player_id WHERE r.rank_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY r.rank_position;

SELECT g.game_name, p1.player_name AS winning_player, p2.player_name AS losing_player FROM game g INNER JOIN player p1 ON g.winning_player_id = p1.player_id INNER JOIN player p2 ON g.losing_player_id = p2.player_id ORDER BY g.game_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players WHERE player_score > 100;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM Players WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM Players;
SELECT match_id, player1_id, player2_id, winner_id, match_date FROM Matches ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT ranking_id, player_id, ranking_score FROM Rankings WHERE ranking_score > 100 ORDER BY ranking_score ASC;
SELECT history_id, player_id, performance_date, performance_score FROM PerformanceHistory WHERE performance_score < 50 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT update_id, player_id, update_type, update_date FROM Updates WHERE update_type = 'new_record';
